hero.title: Bagian Kemahasiswaan
hero.subtitle: Mengembangkan potensi, karakter, dan kesejahteraan mahasiswa menuju lulusan yang unggul dan kompetitif.
hero.subtitleEn: Developing students' potential, character, and well-being to become outstanding and competitive graduates.

profile.title: Profil Singkat
profile.content: Bagian Kemahasiswaan Universitas Al-Irsyad Cilacap (UNAIC) merupakan unit yang dibentuk untuk mengembangkan aktivitas kemahasiswaan yang mampu mendukung terwujudnya mahasiswa Islami, Unggul,  dan Tepercaya.
profile.contentEn: The Student Affairs Division of Al-Irsyad University Cilacap (UNAIC) is a unit established to develop student activities that support the realization of Islamic, excellent, and trustworthy students.

layanan_umum.title: Layanan Kemahasiswaan
layanan_umum.content: Kami menyediakan berbagai layanan administrasi dan pendampingan untuk memfasilitasi kebutuhan mahasiswa selama menempuh pendidikan di UNAIC.
layanan_umum.contentEn: We provide various administrative and support services to facilitate students' needs during their studies at UNAIC.

sections.title: Pengembangan Softskill
sections.content: Program pelatihan dan workshop untuk meningkatkan kemampuan komunikasi, kepemimpinan, dan etika mahasiswa.
sections.detail_content: Program pengembangan softskill di UNAIC dirancang untuk mempersiapkan mahasiswa menghadapi dunia profesional dengan kemampuan interpersonal yang kuat. Pelatihan Kepemimpinan Workshop Komunikasi Efektif Seminar Etika Profesi Problem Solving & Critical Thinking
sections.contentEn: Training programs and workshops to improve students' communication, leadership, and ethics skills.
sections.detail_contentEn: The soft skills development program at UNAIC is designed to prepare students for the professional world with strong interpersonal skills. Leadership Training Effective Communication Workshop Professional Ethics Seminar Problem Solving & Critical Thinking

sections.title: Minat dan Bakat
sections.content: Wadah pengembangan potensi mahasiswa melalui berbagai Unit Kegiatan Mahasiswa (UKM) di bidang seni, olahraga, dan lainnya.
sections.detail_content: Mahasiswa dapat mengembangkan potensi diri melalui berbagai UKM yang tersedia: UKM Olahraga (Basket, Futsal, Badminton)UKM Seni (Paduan Suara, Tari, Musik) UKM Pecinta Alam UKM Keagamaan
sections.contentEn: A forum for developing student potential through various Student Activity Units (UKM) in the fields of arts, sports, and others.
sections.detail_contentEn: Students can develop their potential through various student activity units (UKM) available: Sports UKM (Basketball, Futsal, Badminton) Arts UKM (Choir, Dance, Music) Nature Lovers UKM Religious UKM

sections.title: Bimbingan Konseling
sections.content: Layanan konsultasi psikologis dan akademik untuk membantu mahasiswa mengatasi hambatan pribadi maupun studi.
sections.detail_content: Layanan konseling tersedia bagi seluruh mahasiswa aktif UNAIC untuk mendukung kesehatan mental dan kelancaran studi.
sections.contentEn: Psychological and academic counseling services to help students overcome personal and academic obstacles.
sections.detail_contentEn: Counseling services are available to all active UNAIC students to support their mental health and academic progress.

sections.title: Bimbingan Kewirausahaan
sections.content: Pendampingan bagi mahasiswa yang memiliki minat dalam dunia bisnis melalui pelatihan dan inkubasi bisnis.
sections.detail_content: Program kewirausahaan mendorong mahasiswa untuk mandiri dan kreatif dalam menciptakan peluang bisnis. Program Mahasiswa Wirausaha (PMW) Business Plan Competition Inkubasi Bisnis Kampus
sections.contentEn: Assistance for students interested in the business world through training and business incubation.
sections.detail_contentEn: The entrepreneurship program encourages students to be independent and creative in creating business opportunities. Student Entrepreneurship Program (PMW) Business Plan Competition Campus Business Incubation

sections.title: Layanan Asrama
sections.content: Pengelolaan fasilitas tempat tinggal bagi mahasiswa dengan lingkungan yang kondusif untuk belajar dan berorganisasi.
sections.detail_content: Asrama mahasiswa UNAIC menyediakan fasilitas hunian yang aman dan nyaman, terintegrasi dengan program pembinaan karakter.
sections.contentEn: Management of residential facilities for students with an environment conducive to learning and organizing.
sections.detail_contentEn: The UNAIC student dormitory provides safe and comfortable accommodation facilities, integrated with character building programs.

sections.title: Layanan Kesehatan Mahasiswa
sections.content: Penyediaan fasilitas pelayanan kesehatan dasar dan jaminan kesehatan bagi seluruh mahasiswa aktif.
sections.detail_content: Kesehatan mahasiswa adalah prioritas kami. UNAIC bekerja sama dengan fasilitas kesehatan untuk menjamin pelayanan bagi mahasiswa.
sections.contentEn: Provision of basic health care facilities and health insurance for all active students.
sections.detail_contentEn: Student health is our priority. UNAIC works with health facilities to ensure services for students.

sections.title: Layanan Beasiswa Mahasiswa
sections.content: Informasi dan pengelolaan berbagai jenis beasiswa baik dari internal yayasan maupun external (pemerintah/swasta).
sections.detail_content: Beresbagai sumber beasiswa tersedia untuk mendukung biaya pendidikan mahasiswa berprestasi dan kurang mampu. Beasiswa KIP Kuliah, Beasiswa Prestasi UNAIC, Beasiswa Yayasan Al-Irsyad.
sections.detail_contentEn: Various scholarship sources are available to support the educational costs of outstanding and underprivileged students. KIP Kuliah Scholarship, UNAIC Achievement Scholarship, Al-Irsyad Foundation Scholarship.

sections.title: Pelaksanaan Kegiatan Ilmiah, Penalaran dan Kreatifitas Mahasiswa
sections.content: Dukungan bagi mahasiswa untuk berpartisipasi dalam kompetisi ilmiah, penelitian, dan program kreativitas mahasiswa.
sections.detail_content: Kami mendukung penuh partisipasi mahasiswa dalam ajang ilmiah tingkat nasional maupun internasional. Lomba Karya Tulis Ilmiah (LKTI), Program Kreativitas Mahasiswa (PKM), Olimpiade Sains, Hibah Penelitian Mahasiswa.
sections.titleEn: Implementation of Scientific, Reasoning, and Creativity Activities for Students
sections.contentEn: Implementation of Scientific, Reasoning, and Creativity Activities for Students
sections.detail_contentEn: We fully support student participation in national and international scientific events. Scientific Writing Competition (LKTI), Student Creativity Program (PKM), Science Olympiad, Student Research Grants.
